articles.title: In photos: Asia's athletes at the Tokyo Olympics - CNA
articles.description: From world records to near-misses, historic firsts and victory in the face of personal challenges, Asia’s athletes at the Tokyo Olympics made headlines throughout the Games. Here’s a look back at some of their most memorable moments.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: After a one-year delay, the Games of the XXXII Olympiad finally took place in Tokyo in the shadow of the COVID-19 pandemic.
But while the impact of the coronavirus was always visible, it … [+740 chars]

articles.title: Foreigners seen partying noisily on rooftop, throwing bags of rubbish down the block: Neighbouring restaurant employee - AsiaOne
articles.description: Singapore is currently still under Phase 2 (Heightened Alert) as of writing with social gathering group sizes capped at two since July 20, but that hasn't stopped some groups of people from flouting the rules. In a report published on Saturday (Aug 8), a man …

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Once largely Covid-19 free, Asia economies are now upended by Delta variant virus - The Star Online
articles.description: The delta variant is challenging the part of the world that’s been most successful in blunting the economic impact of Covid-19, with Asian countries that snuffed it out locking down again as the virus returns, and others seeing the world’s highest death rates.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Aug 7 (Bloomberg): The delta variant is challenging the part of the world thats been most successful in blunting the economic impact of Covid-19, with Asian countries that snuffed it out l… [+7818 chars]
